alert.note: Alert for Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 8:00AM CST until December 12 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cibolo Creek Near Falls City. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding of crop and pastureland damages irrigation pumps and any equipment near the channel. Livestock are cut off in low areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.2 feet late this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.6 feet on 12/04/1965. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Cibolo Creek Falls City 17.0 15.3 Mon 7 am CST 1.9 1.4 1.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CST.
